page_analysis.text_content:
Parking

Parking regulations af-
fect the appearance of
the streetscapes in our
residential neighbor-
hoods by minimizing
the number of cars
parked on the street
and in the front yards
by requiring that there
are parking spaces
available deeper into
the lot.

Code sections
Page 34
18.12.060, 18.83.090
Page 35
18.83.090, 18.83.110(a)
Page 36
18.12.060
Page 37
18.12.040 (f)
Page 38
18.12.060
Page 39
18.12.080 (b)

34

Parking space standards

• Two spaces are required on the lot (per
dwelling).

• They may NOT be located in the
required front yard or, first 10 ft of,
required street side yard.

• 2nd dwelling units have same require-
ments.

• No underground parking garages except
by variance.

• One of the two spaces must be covered.

• To be considered detached, a covered-
parking structure must be a minimum of
3' from the main dwelling.

• Minimim size for an uncovered space is
8.5' x 18'.

• Minimum clearance inside a covered
parking structure to be 10' x 20' for
each space. Therefore, a two-car garage
or carport to be 20' x 20' clear inside.

• Minimum vertical clearance: 7'.

* Clear area for parking space must be free
of other uses e.g., water heaters, clothes
washers or dryer, bicycle parking facili-
ties, etc.

Fig 28 Parking space dimensions for garage
and uncovered space in plan view

inside
clearance

visual_elements.description: Figure 28: Parking space dimensions for garage and uncovered space in plan view. It shows two parking spaces, one covered and one uncovered, arranged in tandem. The covered space has a minimum inside clearance of 10' wide and 20' long. The uncovered space is 8.5' wide and 18' long. A vertical arrow with '20' min. inside clearance' points to the length of the covered space. Another vertical arrow with '18' min. uncovered space' points to the length of the uncovered space. A horizontal arrow with '10' min inside clearance' points to the width of the covered space. Another horizontal arrow with '8.5' min uncovered space' points to the width of the uncovered space. Asterisks are placed next to the 10' min inside clearance, 20' min inside clearance, and 8.5' min uncovered space dimensions, indicating a note or further detail.

technical_specifications.parameter: Minimum size for an uncovered space
Minimum clearance inside a covered parking structure (single space)
Minimum clearance inside a two-car garage or carport
Minimum distance of covered-parking structure from main dwelling (if detached)
Maximum location in required front yard or street side yard

sections: Parking regulations affect the appearance of the streetscapes in our residential neighborhoods by minimizing the number of cars parked on the street and in the front yards by requiring that there are parking spaces available deeper into the lot.

additional_notes: The page number '34' is located at the bottom left.
The left column with 'Parking' heading and descriptive text is shaded gray.
Asterisks are used to denote specific conditions or measurements in the text and the figure, implying a connection between them, though not explicitly stated as footnotes.

qualifiers.text: Therefore, a two-car garage or carport to be 20' x 20' clear inside.
e.g., water heaters, clothes washers or dryer, bicycle parking facilities, etc.

conditions.text: Two spaces are required on the lot
They may NOT be located in the required front yard
They may NOT be located in the first 10 ft of, required street side yard
One of the two spaces must be covered
a covered-parking structure must be a minimum of 3' from the main dwelling
Minimim size for an uncovered space is 8.5' x 18'
Minimum clearance inside a covered parking structure to be 10' x 20'
a two-car garage or carport to be 20' x 20' clear inside
Clear area for parking space must be free of other uses

logical_relationships.expression: They may NOT be located in the required front yard OR, first 10 ft of, required street side yard.

execution_sequence.action: Ensure two parking spaces are provided on the lot.
Verify parking spaces are not located in the required front yard or within the first 10 ft of the required street side yard.
Apply the same parking requirements to 2nd dwelling units.
Prohibit underground parking garages unless a variance is obtained.
Ensure at least one of the two required parking spaces is covered.
If a covered-parking structure is detached, ensure it is a minimum of 3' from the main dwelling.
Verify the minimum size for an uncovered parking space is 8.5' x 18'.
Ensure minimum clearance inside a covered parking structure is 10' x 20' for each space.
If a two-car garage or carport, ensure it is 20' x 20' clear inside.
Ensure minimum vertical clearance of 7' for parking spaces.
Ensure the clear area for parking space is free of other uses.
